nodes.documentation:
A base contract to be inherited by any contract that want to receive relayed transactions
A subclass must use "_msgSender()" instead of "msg.sender"
nodes.name: BaseRelayRecipient

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Function can only be called through trustedForwarder"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Function can only be called through trustedForwarder"

nodes.documentation:
return the sender of this call.
if the call came through our trusted forwarder, return the original sender.
otherwise, return `msg.sender`.
should be used in the contract anywhere instead of msg.sender
nodes.name: _msgSender
